verses.verse: לְדָוִ֡ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid [A Psalm] of David אֵלֶ֥יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha to יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Unto thee O LORD נַפְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> naf-Shi my soul אֶשָּֽׂא׃ <WH5375> 'es-Sa. do I lift up

אֱ‍ ֽלֹהַ֗י <WH430> 'elo-Hai, O my God בְּךָ֣ be-Cha בָ֭טַחְתִּי <WH982> Va-tach-ti I trust אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not אֵב֑וֹשָׁה <WH954> e-Voo-shah; in thee let me not be ashamed אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay יַֽעַלְצ֖וּ <WH5970> ya-'al-Tzu triumph אֹיְבַ֣י <WH341> 'o-ye-Vai let not mine enemies לִֽי׃ Li.

גַּ֣ם <WH1571> gam Indeed כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- who קֹ֭וֶיךָ <WH6960> Koei-cha Yea let none that wait לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not יֵבֹ֑שׁוּ <WH954> ye-Vo-shu; on thee be ashamed יֵ֝בֹ֗שׁוּ <WH954> ye-Vo-shu, let them be ashamed הַבּוֹגְדִ֥ים <WH898> hab-bog-Dim which transgress רֵיקָֽם׃ <WH7387> rei-Kam. without cause

דְּרָכֶ֣יךָ <WH1870> de-ra-Chei-cha me thy ways יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD הוֹדִיעֵ֑נִי <WH3045> ho-di-'E-ni; Shew אֹ֖רְחוֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH734> o-re-cho-Tei-cha me thy paths לַמְּדֵֽנִי׃ <WH3925> lam-me-De-ni. teach

הַדְרִ֘יכֵ֤נִי <WH1869> had-Ri-Che-ni Lead בַאֲמִתֶּ֨ךָ׀ <WH571> va-'a-mit-Te-cha me in thy truth וְֽלַמְּדֵ֗נִי <WH3925> ve-lam-me-De-ni, and teach כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אַ֭תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah You אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei me for thou [art] the God יִשְׁעִ֑י <WH3468> yish-'I; of my salvation אוֹתְךָ֥ <WH854> 'ot-Cha for קִ֝וִּ֗יתִי <WH6960> kiv-Vi-ti, on thee do I wait כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> hai-Yom. all the day

זְכֹר־ <WH2142> ze-chor- Remember רַחֲמֶ֣יךָ <WH7356> ra-cha-Mei-cha thy tender mercies יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD וַחֲסָדֶ֑יךָ <WH2617> va-cha-sa-Dei-cha; and thy lovingkindnesses כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for מֵעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> me-'o-Lam for they [have been] ever of old הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> Hem-mah. like

חַטֹּ֤אות <WH2403> chat-Tot not the sins נְעוּרַ֨י׀ <WH5271> ne-'u-Rai of my youth וּפְשָׁעַ֗י <WH6588> u-fe-sha-'Ai, nor my transgressions אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּ֫זְכֹּ֥ר <WH2142> tiz-Kor Remember כְּחַסְדְּךָ֥ <WH2617> ke-chas-de-Cha according to thy mercy זְכָר־ <WH2142> ze-chor- remember לִי־ li- אַ֑תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah; you לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an sake טוּבְךָ֣ <WH2898> tu-ve-Cha thou me for thy goodness' יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. sake O LORD

טוֹב־ <WH2896> tov- Good וְיָשָׁ֥ר <WH3477> ve-ya-Shar and upright יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; [is] the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> ken after that יוֹרֶ֖ה <WH3384> yo-Reh therefore will he teach חַטָּאִ֣ים <WH2400> chat-ta-'Im sinners בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> bad-Da-rech. in the way

יַדְרֵ֣ךְ <WH1869> yad-Rech will he guide עֲ֭נָוִים <WH6035> 'A-na-vim The meek בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> bam-mish-Pat; in judgment וִֽילַמֵּ֖ד <WH3925> vi-lam-Med will he teach עֲנָוִ֣ים <WH6035> 'a-na-Vim and the meek דַּרְכּֽוֹ׃ <WH1870> dar-Ko. his way

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All אָרְח֣וֹת <WH734> a-re-Chot All the paths יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD חֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> Che-sed [are] mercy וֶאֱמֶ֑ת <WH571> ve-'e-Met; and truth לְנֹצְרֵ֥י <WH5341> le-no-tze-Rei unto such as keep בְ֝רִית֗וֹ <WH1285> ve-ri-To, his covenant וְעֵדֹתָֽיו׃ <WH5713> ve-'e-do-Tav. and his testimonies

לְמַֽעַן־ <WH4616> le-ma-'an- sake שִׁמְךָ֥ <WH8034> shim-Cha For thy name's יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; sake O LORD וְֽסָלַחְתָּ֥ <WH5545> ve-sa-lach-Ta pardon לַ֝עֲוֹנִ֗י <WH5771> la-'a-vo-Ni, mine iniquity כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for רַב־ <WH7227> rav- for it [is] great הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he

מִי־ <WH4310> mi- Who זֶ֣ה <WH2088> zeh he הָ֭אִישׁ <WH376> Ha-'ish What man יְרֵ֣א <WH3373> ye-Re [is] he that feareth יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; Jehovah י֝וֹרֶ֗נּוּ <WH3384> yo-Ren-nu, archer בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> be-De-rech in the way יִבְחָֽר׃ <WH977> yiv-Char. [that] he shall choose

נַ֭פְשׁוֹ <WH5315> naf-sho His soul בְּט֣וֹב <WH2896> be-Tov at ease תָּלִ֑ין <WH3885> ta-Lin; shall dwell וְ֝זַרְע֗וֹ <WH2233> ve-zar-'O, and his seed יִ֣ירַשׁ <WH3423> Yi-rash shall inherit אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> 'A-retz. the earth

ס֣וֹד <WH5475> Sod The secret יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD לִירֵאָ֑יו <WH3373> li-re-'Av; [is] with them that fear וּ֝בְרִית֗וֹ <WH1285> u-ve-ri-To, them his covenant לְהוֹדִיעָֽם׃ <WH3045> le-ho-di-'Am. him and he will shew

עֵינַ֣י <WH5869> 'ei-Nai Mine eyes תָּ֭מִיד <WH8548> Ta-mid [are] ever אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- toward יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; toward the LORD כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for הֽוּא־ <WH1931> hu- He יוֹצִ֖יא <WH3318> yo-Tzi for he shall pluck מֵרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7568> me-Re-shet out of the net רַגְלָֽי׃ <WH7272> rag-Lai. my feet

פְּנֵה־ <WH6437> pe-neh- Turn אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me וְחָנֵּ֑נִי <WH2603> ve-chon-Ne-ni thee unto me and have mercy כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For יָחִ֖יד <WH3173> ya-Chid upon me for I [am] desolate וְעָנִ֣י <WH6041> ve-'a-Ni and afflicted אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> 'A-ni. I

צָר֣וֹת <WH6869> tza-Rot The troubles לְבָבִ֣י <WH3824> le-va-Vi of my heart הִרְחִ֑יבוּ <WH7337> hir-Chi-vu; are enlarged מִ֝מְּצֽוּקוֹתַ֗י <WH4691> mi-me-tzu-ko-Tai, of my distresses הוֹצִיאֵֽנִי׃ <WH3318> ho-tzi-'E-ni. [O] bring thou me out

רְאֵ֣ה <WH7200> re-'Eh Look עָ֭נְיִי <WH6040> 'A-ne-yi upon mine affliction וַעֲמָלִ֑י <WH5999> va-'a-ma-Li; and my pain וְ֝שָׂ֗א <WH5375> ve-Sa, and forgive לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all חַטֹּאותָֽי׃ <WH2403> chat-to-Tai. all my sins

רְאֵֽה־ <WH7200> re-'eh- Consider אוֹיְבַ֥י <WH341> 'oy-Vai mine enemies כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for רָ֑בּוּ <WH7231> Rab-bu; for they are many וְשִׂנְאַ֖ת <WH8130> ve-sin-'At and they hate חָמָ֣ס <WH2555> cha-Mas me with cruel שְׂנֵאֽוּנִי׃ <WH8135> se-ne-'U-ni. hatred

שָׁמְרָ֣ה <WH8104> sha-me-Rah O keep נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> Naf-shi my soul וְהַצִּילֵ֑נִי <WH5337> ve-hatz-tzi-Le-ni; and deliver אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not אֵ֝ב֗וֹשׁ <WH954> e-Voosh, me let me not be ashamed כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for חָסִ֥יתִי <WH2620> cha-Si-ti for I put my trust בָֽךְ׃ Vach.

תֹּם־ <WH8537> tom- Let integrity וָיֹ֥שֶׁר <WH3476> va-Yo-sher and uprightness יִצְּר֑וּנִי <WH5341> yitz-tze-Ru-ni; preserve כִּ֝֗י <WH3588> Ki, for קִוִּיתִֽיךָ׃ <WH6960> kiv-vi-Ti-cha. me for I wait

פְּדֵ֣ה <WH6299> pe-Deh Redeem אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him O God אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; Israel מִ֝כֹּ֗ל <WH3605> mik-Kol, of all צָֽרוֹתָיו׃ <WH6869> Tza-ro-tav out of all his troubles
